name: Turtle Hermit
description: Turtle Hermit is a comedic RPG about a teenager called Ashley, who goes on a bizarre journey around the world  looking for the legendary Power Stones in order to find their long-lost dad. Along their way, they'll discover a robotic rat with a weird sense of logic, a cat scientist who builds gigantic robots, a carnival run by an evil pig, a village populated entirely by incredibly muscular dogs (and one wolf), a group of histrionic fleas known as the Fleagion, and a mysterious plan to destroy the entire world...
